Class Book

java.lang.Object
Book
public class Book extends Object
This class represents a basic book with a title, author, year, and price. To simplify the assignment, the author field is just a String.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Book(String title, String author, int year, float price)
    Construct a Book object that has the provided title, author and price.

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, int year, float price)
      Construct a Book object that has the provided title, author and price.
      Parameters:
      title - the title to be given to this book
      author - the author of this book
      year - year in which the book was published
      price - the price to be assigned to this book

    • before

      public boolean before(int year)
      Determine if this book was published before a given year.
      Parameters:
      year - the year to test against
      Returns:
      true if this book was published before the provided year, false otherwise

    • cheaperThan

      public boolean cheaperThan(Book book)
      Determine if this book is cheaper than the book passed to it.
      Parameters:
      book - the book whose price should be compared to this book
      Returns:
      true if this book is cheaper than the other book, false otherwise
